item.title: I AM CURRENTLY WORKING VERY HARD ON EKC 30. RELEASE SHOULD BE SOON! SORRY IF YOU DONT LIKE EKC MANS HAT. HE IS AN ANGEL FAN. IF YOU HAD ISSUES UPDATING WHERE YOU HAVE THE BLUE SCREEN, HIGHLIGHT ADDONS THAN CLICK TO THE RIGHT TO EKC WIZARD, NEXT CLICK EKC WIZARD BUILD, THAN EKC 2X.XX. WHATEVER VERSION IS THERE. THAN CLICK FRESH INSTALL AND FORCE CLOSE WHEN DONE. IF YOU STILL KEEP GETTING THE BLUE SCREEN AFTER YOU UPDATE YOU NEED TO UPGRADE TO KODI 18. TO DO THIS, HIGHLIGHT ADDONS THAN CLICK TO THE RIGHT TO EKC WIZARD, NEXT CLICK EKC APK INSTALLER, KODI 18, DOWNLOAD AND INSTALL. AFETR THIS FOLLOW THE ABOVE STEPS TO GET EKC BACK.

DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN BECOME AN EKC CONTRIBUTOR BY SUBSCRIBING AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/VIPCONTRIBUTOR OR MAKE A ONE TIME DONATION AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG OR SCAN OUR VENMO CODE ON THE EKC SECTION- CONTRIBUTORS WILL RECIEVE SPECIAL PERKS, FREE RAFFLES, AND FREE ADVERTISEMENTS - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM LIVE CONTENT. PLEASE WATCH THE DEMO VIDEO UNDER THE GEARS SECTION TO SEE IT IN ACTION. SIGN UP AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/GEARSTV - THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
